tradeCredits1.description: Contains 1 Trade Credit. Use it to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits2.description: Contains 3 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits3.description: Contains 5 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits4.description: Contains 10 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

tradeCredits5.description: Contains 25 Trade Credits. Use these to trade pins with other users.

brawler.description: Randomly selects a new brawler to unlock. If all brawlers of a specific rarity are unlocked, the probability of getting a brawler of all other rarities increases.

avatart1.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of C. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of B- to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart2.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of B-. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of B+ to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart3.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of B+. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of A to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart4.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of A. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of A+ to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart5.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of A+. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of S- to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart6.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of S-. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of S to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart7.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of S. Purchase this avatar and reach a collection score of S+ to purchase the next avatar in this series.

avatart8.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching a collection score of S+. This is the final avatar in this series of collection score rewards.

avatar1.description: Contains a new avatar. This avatar can be selected in the account settings.

avatar2.description: Contains a new avatar. This avatar can be selected in the account settings.

avatar3.description: Contains a new avatar. This avatar can be selected in the account settings.

avatar4.description: Contains a new avatar. This avatar can be selected in the account settings.

avatara1.description: This avatar is a reward for purchasing at least 12 different avatars.

avatara2.description: This avatar is a reward for purchasing at least 12 different themes.

avatara3.description: This avatar is a reward for collecting at least 2000 pin copies.

avatar0.description: This avatar is a reward for reaching mastery level 30. There is no error in loading an image: this avatar is intended to be fully transparent.

theme1.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme2.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme3.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme4.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme5.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme6.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme7.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme8.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme9.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme10.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme11.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme12.description: This theme is a reward for unlocking all pins for at least half of the brawlers. It contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme13.description: This bundle contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme14.description: This theme is a reward for reaching mastery level 12. It contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme15.description: This theme is a reward for reaching mastery level 15. It contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme16.description: This theme is a reward for reaching mastery level 21. It contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme17.description: This theme is a reward for reaching mastery level 24. It contains a new background, icon style, and music.

theme0.description: This theme is a reward for reaching mastery level 30. It contains a new background, icon style, and music.

scene1.description: Adds a new background scene for the 3D model viewer.

scene2.description: Adds a new background scene for the 3D model viewer.

scene3.description: This scene is a reward for unlocking at least half of the brawlers. It adds a new background scene for the 3D model viewer.

scene4.description: This scene is a reward for unlocking all of the brawlers. It adds a new background scene for the 3D model viewer.

scene5.description: This scene is a reward for reaching mastery level 18. It adds a new background scene for the 3D model viewer.

scene6.description: This scene is a reward for reaching mastery level 27. It adds a new background scene for the 3D model viewer.
